Belen - _LWE - Valter

2011-04-23 Deanna Zuniga sent this to me: Ok. Today I was in service and I met a Philippine who didn’t speak Spanish. What to visit him? It is a Saturday morning call because he works. He asked me the difference between Jehovah’s witnesses and other religions. I didn’t have the English bible so I had to just talk to him. I told him one important difference is we focus on what the bible teaches. He had spoken to some “Born Agains” but didn’t like how they say the Spirit comes upon them.

Anyway, On the main road that lead to San Antonio de Belen (one way road) there is a Nursery on the left hand side then just about 50 mts on the same side of the road there is a little dirt driveway and there are two houses in the back to the left. It’s the last house…..Color??? I don’t remember but I think it’s Pink/peach. His name is Valter (that’s what he said, like Walter with a German accent I think).

Deanna

2010/09/30 Wayne Richards referred to me. He placed English and Spanish BH books.
Notes:He is x-marine and now a law student. Wife is a dentist.Here is the basic info on Jen's/mine female dentist and husband who I placed two English Bibles and one Spanish and one English Bible Teach books this past Monday.Robert Diaz: Ex-Marine now studying to be a lawyer. He speaks "very good" English and his wife speaks mainly Spanish.I spent several hours talking to the husband and he informed me they switched from a San Jose church to a local church recently because they wanted "to study the Bible" more thoroughly. I showed Robert how to use the Bible Teach book and suggested the two have a weekly "Family Bible Study" together because that is what I and other Jehovah's Witnesses do. He liked the idea and said he would. Both are very open and friendly and as Jen and I left he said that: " His house... was our house."Their home is also her dental clinic up near Alberto/Lloyd Martinez's home. Brother Foster also knows how to get there.Robert Diaz: 8869-6960   Heredia, Costa Rica.Doctor Lucy Veronica Diaz: 8365-7129 cell and clinica: 2237-8800The doctor does very good work at very good prices. Just to let you know. Hope they are "right-hearted" and something comes of your follow-up. Wayne.
